prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Brass, Guitar, Organ, Drums, Bass, but without Piano.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features Brass, Guitar, Organ, Drums, and Bass, but Piano is absent.

Style 2:
This composition is comprised of Brass, Guitar, Organ, Drums, and Bass, but Piano is not included.

Style 3:
This song has Brass, Guitar, Organ, Drums, and Bass, but Piano is not part of it.
